title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: And herein a row beside their parents' tomb stand the marble effigies of a wholefamily of Braces of Blairhall, eighteenth-century tenants of the ancientAbbey coal-mines, and ancestors of the Lords of Kinloss and Earls of Elgin*
